item.title: Introducing: Soccer Analytics Library
item.description: Quick Update If the app is not available through the usual link the likely cause is that the usage limit has been exceeded. You can continue to access all articles through a table below. You can also clone the project on Github and run the tool locally. Hopefully the app will be up again after a few days. As many year-end Twitter threads have highlighted: 2020 was a great year for soccer analytics.
